author: kasini3000
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/16737

Currently, the file & folder UnixMode of powershell has no numeric Property, user must write a script to calculate it by himself.


### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

Property name is "LinuxNumber" or "Number"

Don't forget SGID, SUID and sticky bit, eg:
1777

When listing a directory, Property may not be displayed by default, but are displayed when format-list.
